winners.descript: Chat and play casino games with other users, mint your own custom NFTs, and view and trade your NFTs elsewhere.
A game in which players guess words by revealing blocks from a blurry image.
A note taking tool for online meetings with live transcript and tracks a user's meeting statistics (frequency of meetings, common words spoken).
BEAsleep is a web-based interactive sleep tracker that encourages students to sleep more healthily with the ability for users to customize their own cute beaver!

honorableMentions.descript: Our website is a platform that brings people together to virtually connect through the popular social game, Paranoia.
Graph Ninja teaches users about quadratic functions in a fun, original, and engaging way.

semifinalists.descript: Two-player card game where you build sentences from cards and activate them to reach your goal.
Wildcard is an online multiplayer card game creator.
Identify is a quizbowl style multiplayer game where users listen to a song and try to guess it as fast as possible.
Chimera Doodles is an online, multiplayer game that allows parties of up to 8 users to create drawings together.

winners.descript: A multiplayer game of online tag. Every move causes you to slide in a direction until you hit an obstacle, so be careful!
SoroSoke listens to you speak and gives you feedback on a variety of common speaking metrics, showing you how to improve.
Musicards is a fun way to find new music and share your favorite songs with others! Log in with Spotify, make requests, trade songs, and build your deck :)
The Write Pet encourages reflection. Adopt a pet and journal consistently to raise your pet’s happiness. Take care of yourself by taking care of your pet!

honorableMentions.descript: Create custom maps to battle on and step up your laser tag game with extraordinary power ups, while dodging using ML-powered posenets.
WeWorld users upload photos and add tags and captions to view their pictures and experiences through the lens of a new language.

semifinalists.descript: Fanvision is a platform for NBA fans who want to predict game outcomes without betting money. Users compete to top the daily podium and season standings.
RememBomb is a card matching and social deduction game for 5+ players (more the merrier)! Keep your eyes focused on the board at all times.
Personify is a Spotify Playlist Generator that creates a playlist based on an input message, specified genres, and algorithm choice.
A4A is a site designed to help MIT students get their questions answered in a quick, informative, and easy fashion.

winners.descript: We created a comprehensive, immersive, and collaborative storytelling app, utilizing modern technology to breathe new life into the classic text adventure.
An easy and fun way to train your machine learning models through the web. No Tensors. No Torches. All you.
Day.ly streamlines bullet journaling online. It has a daily autosaving notebook, trackable, customizable widgets, collections, and custom themes.
em7 allows users who are interested in music but don't have much music theory background a platform to create and share their own melodies and harmonies.

honorableMentions.descript: This is a website that lets you build a 3D music visualizer out of voxels that respond to the music you play.
Create open source quantum circuits, simulate them and compete with your friends by playing pong. Easy way to teach people new to quantum how it all works.

semifinalists.descript: pop'n is a cultural enrichment game to satisfy curiosity about places around the world through online polls and data visualizations. let's get pop'n!
colorfly makes creating unique art easy for users through generative designs. Download, share, and track progress!
Study Garden allows students to keep track of their study sessions in the form of flowers that grow as they study.
Craft your own computer-generated poetry. Choose a corpus and a poem structure, and watch the magic happen!
A game where you can log water drinking and use it to water a virtual garden. Plants are dynamically generated & you can cross breed them to make new ones.

winners.descript: Create beautiful, compelling animated presentations right on the web. Think Adobe After Effects, a powerful animation software, inside the browser!
Dilemma Llama helps people crowdsource opinions on hard dilemmas. Users post dilemmas, and other users respond with arguments for either 'Yes' or 'No.'
Play songs with your friends! In space! It's like Patatap but social and collaborative.
A rhythm game for music lovers of all kinds! Welcomes casual players as well as providing incentive (stars) for those who want to better their skills!
Routify allows users to game their productivity by getting points and gold when the user finishes something they need to do.

honorableMentions.descript: One question per day, 365 days per year. Dive into a universe where you can record your thoughts, explore others’ responses, and reflect on your past self.
Take turns adding letters to the end of the string - avoid spelling a complete word, or you'll become a ghost. Ghost all your friends to win!

semifinalists.descript: explore new songs with others in an open world. queue music to shared nodes to create collaborative playlists. add favorites to your personal collection!
A modern take on classic card games that allow close friends to continually play games on and off.
We built an in-browser game that allows you to type race against other people or on your own. Typing content is fresh, daily news.
SnapStack is a social judge-based card game where players respond to prompts by making memes out of each other, using images from social media profiles.

winners.descript: Your pixel art community
Play telephone pictionary with your friends! Make up a phrase and watch as your friends attempt to draw, caption, redraw, and recaption!
Create and stream playlists from SoundCloud, Spotify, and Youtube. Combine professional tracks with indie remixes for the best experience.
A collaborative annotation tool for lecture notes. Study, share insights and grow a network of knowledge among your peers.

honorableMentions.descript: Mark outdoor areas for other people to find. Plan events, write reviews and discover new natural areas around you!
An interactive map for sharing and finding free food. Keeps track of foods near you, erasing the need to wade through pools of irrelevant postings.

winners.descript: Provides the MIT community with the location, type, distance, and time of free food postings in a user friendly way!
Want to see some of your craziest imaginations come to life? On inkspire, you can post an idea, and see what others have to illustrate for you!
A task scheduling app with features aimed to keep your todo lists organized and your mind focused on one thing at a time.
By integrating the free-food@mit.edu mailing list with new features, Free Food Finder offers a better food finding experience for the MIT community.

semifinalists.descript: A web app that pairs MIT students up to eat at dining halls! Befriend peers, connect with friends, and enjoy a delicious meal in good company.
Organize and discover public study sessions and pset parties. Invite friends and sync schedules with a variety of calendar applications.
Get matched to meet someone in person at a local event, skipping the awkward "get to know each other" phase of other friend-matching apps.

winners.descript: A picture is worth 1000 words. What if we take out half the words from your picture and asked someone else to draw what they think it is?
Share your favorite napping locations and pictures of napping friends around campus. Climb your way to the top of our Dreamerboard for fame and glory.
A crowd-sourced DJing application - allows you to host your own "station" to give guests the ability to add songs to a queue and vote on what's next.
With a click of a button, restaurants can easily provide wait times for customers to conveniently view when deciding where to eat.

honorableMentions.descript: A social media platform for creating and sharing goals. Weekly check-ins help you stay focused and create productive competition among friends.
Helps you achieve your financial goals so you can achieve your adventurous ones.

semifinalists.descript: Reach out with comfort and security. Connect to members of a particular group to learn more about them!
A simpler version of Infinite Connection, designed to help MIT students and alumni network together.
View the newest and most popular food images and share your latest food experiences and recipes.
A tool used to connect tutorials and websites for easier viewing. Makes discovering new content a simple process.
Provides a personal experience for discovering and saving recipes. Search meals by ingredients or create new ones.

winners.descript: Upload, view, and save products for sale. Users are given a way to easily carry out transactions with each other.
An language-learning tool that connects students from all around the world.
A platform for students to open restaurants out of their dorm. Choose to either host a meal (charging a fee or not) or attend a meal.

semifinalists.descript: Maintain your own personal library, available for others to borrow. A social network for readers that actually has what you want to read.
Connects skilled college students to ambitious hobbyist students. Students post tasks to be completed so skilled users can put their skills to work.
Allows users to make goals and daily tasks for those goals. View the goals of other users, and even add others' goals to your list.
Volunteering gamified. Upload challenges for volunteers to complete or earn points for completing posts.

winners.descript: Fratworks.xyz is a dashboard that helps manage chores and tasks of a fraternity to ensure an even contribution by all members.
With Yarn, join a community of people writing beautiful, collaborative stories.
Overlaps is an online platform through teachers and students can both take and offer classes, with a unique pricing system.
MoneyMatters is a money tracking web app designed for the average millennial, featuring a split charge calculator and detailed history views.

honorableMentions.descript: Make predictions. Interact with other people's predictions. Explore how close everyone's predictions were to reality.
Course TBD shows you what classes your friends are taking and your next Pset's due date on one shared calendar.

semifinalists.descript: Whenever someone loses or finds an item, they can use our IHTFYP to easily find or return it, which matches similar lost and found forms.
A roadtrip meal planner: given start and destination points, Uhmm suggests good restaurants along the way and displays them on a map.
Firefly helps you to capture, catalog, and share day-to-day sayings, quotes, and memories, storing them for whenever you need a quick pick-me-up.

winners.descript: markit is an educational stock market alternative that allows you to practice trading in the market without knowing technical terms or the monetary risk.
Graffiti lets users create unstructured message boards. Users vote on messages' lifespans to extend the period of time they are displayed.
Skiary is a reimagining of the personal diary. Using geolocation services and a weather API, Skiary generates calming sky gradients and graphics into its UI.

semifinalists.descript: Pantry is a web app designed to help people use their spare ingredients in order to cook meals that align with their exercise and wellness goals.
MyBucket is a web application that allows users to make a bucket list and then provides local opportunities to fulfill their dreams.
S'mores is a webapp that lets you plan your meals efficiently by minimizing the time spent in creating your grocery list.
Meet more people and finish your psets! With Pset Buddies you can enter your pset progress and find people to work with!
Build your hackathon team using HackHomies' custom recommendation and search systems.

winners.descript: Harmony is a web app designed to facilitate online collaborative sheet music composition.
MediaSync lets you watch videos and listen to music with your friends no matter how far away they are - and all in perfect sync!
Make friends, explore cities, and share your memories with other travelers near you, with our travel buddy Nomad!
Search a growing database of 6000+ problems by tags, or peruse problems in existing sets, and solve them!

honorableMentions.descript: Create beautiful, interactive maps for your website or presentation without coding anything with our full-feature editor and intuitive tutorial system.
Grapes is a community-based web platform where anyone can buy and sell used items in their own marketplace.
LinguaGem is a series of games designed to help the user learn basic phrases in any language of choice.

winners.descript: travelingtable allows users to explore and post recipes from cuisines around the world through an interactive map.
GreenBuggle promotes responsible travel by comparing the monetary, time, and environmental costs of driving, public transport or walking.
Hitch finds people for you to share rides with. Just tell us where you want to go and we'll match you with other people on similar routes.
